translation: Of those who punish, I am the scepter; among those who seek victory, I am statesmanship; and among secrets, I am silence; I am knowledge among knowers.
commentary: 10.38 The rod the sceptre? Damayatam among punishers? I am (I) am? Policy: statesmanship? I am (I) am? jigishatam among those who seek victory? Silence silence? f and? Eve also? I am (I) am? among secrets of the secrets? Knowledge the knowledge? among the knowers? I I.Commentary Niti Diplomacy? polity.Maunam The silence produced by constant meditation on Brahman or the Self.Jnanam Knowledge of the Self.
